caption.p: Variation of mean essential oil percentage ( v/w) during the growing season in annual needles of individual plants of Picea abies in habitats No. 1 ( a), No. 2 ( b), and No. 3 ( c). On X-axis, the first part of a combined number indicates habitat number, and the second indicates individual plant number within that habitat. Error bars indicate Â± SD; different letters denote statistically significant ( p < 0.05) differences between months within plants.
